title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)), and by Reference 19 in Table 2 to Schedule
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Claims, Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 4) (Income Disregard) 
Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations and the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2021 shall be construed together as 
one and may be cited together as the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2021. 

Commencement

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)), and by Reference 19 in Table 2 to Schedule
heading: 2. These Regulations shall have effect from 1 October 2020.
text_raw:
2. These Regulations shall have effect from 1 October 2020. 

Disregard of certain income

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)), and by Reference 19 in Table 2 to Schedule
heading: 3. Article 155 of the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, Payments and
text_raw:
3. Article 155 of the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, Payments and 
Control) Regulations 2007 (S. I. No. 142 of 2007) is amended by the insertion 
of the following paragraph after paragraph (bc): 

“(bd) in so far as it relates to a claim for disability allowance, any ex gratia 
payments made by the State Claims Agency arising from claims settled on or 
after 1 October 2020 in respect of the Pandemrix vaccine,”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the foregoing 
Regulations. 

[35] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 January, 2021. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 January, 2021. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [35]

title: Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)), and by Reference 19 in Table 2 to Schedule
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide, in relation to any claim for Disability Allowance, 
that any ex gratia payment made by the State Claims Agency in the case of a 
claim settled on or after 1 October 2020 in respect of the Pandemrix vaccine will 
be disregarded in the assessment of means. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [35] 5
